skills.name: Energy Surge
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If this character has absorbed Elemental Energy, it will release that element for +1 DMG and change DMG type to the absorbed element.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 5 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>. If this character has absorbed Elemental Energy, it will release that element for +1 DMG and change DMG type to the absorbed element.
skills.description: Deals 5 Physical DMG. If this character has absorbed Elemental Energy, it will release that element for +1 DMG and change DMG type to the absorbed element.

skills.name: Standard Armor
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) The $[K100] this character receives is halved (Rounded up)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) The {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> this character receives is halved (Rounded up)
skills.description: (Passive) The Physical DMG this character receives is halved (Rounded up)

skills.name: Elemental Absorption
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>When no element has been absorbed and this character takes Elemental DMG</color>, absorb that element.\nHalve DMG of that element taken by this character. (Rounded up)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) <color=#FFFFFFFF>When no element has been absorbed and this character takes Elemental DMG</color>, absorb that element.\nHalve DMG of that element taken by this character. (Rounded up)
skills.description:
(Passive) When no element has been absorbed and this character takes Elemental DMG, absorb that element.
Halve DMG of that element taken by this character. (Rounded up)
